youtube.title: Medical Procedure: Draining Fluid from Smoker's Lungs (Thoracentesis)
youtube.description: Watch a medical professional perform a thoracentesis to remove pleural effusion fluid from a patient. This video highlights the impact of smoking on lung health and the biological consequences of respiratory issues. Educational content for biology students and health enthusiasts.
